H0.text: Botswana was known by what name until 1966. Rhodesia

H1.text: Botswana was known by what name until 1966. Basutoland

H2.text: Botswana was known by what name until 1966. Swaziland

H3.text: Botswana was known by what name until 1966. Bechuanaland

A4.text: The Bechuanaland Protectorate was established on 31 March 1885 in Southern Africa by the United Kingdom.
